param.name: Performance.Query
param.value: SELECT TimeStamp, {query.expression} FROM APM_ApplicationStatus_Detail WHERE ApplicationID = {element.AppID} AND TimeStamp >= :queryi18n.from AND TimeStamp <= CASE WHEN :queryi18n.to > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE :queryi18n.to END UNION ALL SELECT TimeStamp, {query.expression} FROM APM_ApplicationStatus_Hourly WHERE ApplicationID = {element.AppID} AND TimeStamp >= :queryi18n.from AND TimeStamp <= CASE WHEN :queryi18n.to > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE :queryi18n.to END UNION ALL SELECT TimeStamp, {query.expression} FROM APM_ApplicationStatus_Daily WHERE ApplicationID = {element.AppID} AND TimeStamp >= :queryi18n.from AND TimeStamp <= CASE WHEN :queryi18n.to > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE :queryi18n.to END

param.name: Performance.Query
param.value: SELECT TimeStamp, {query.expression} FROM ( ( SELECT TimeStamp, PercentAvailability, ComponentID FROM APM_ComponentStatus_Detail WHERE ComponentID = {element.ComponentID} AND ApplicationID = {element.AppID} AND TimeStamp >= :queryi18n.from AND TimeStamp <= CASE WHEN :queryi18n.to > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE :queryi18n.to END UNION ALL SELECT TimeStamp, PercentAvailability, ComponentID FROM APM_ComponentStatus_Hourly WHERE ComponentID = {element.ComponentID} AND ApplicationID = {element.AppID} AND TimeStamp >= :queryi18n.from AND TimeStamp <= CASE WHEN :queryi18n.to > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE :queryi18n.to END UNION ALL SELECT TimeStamp, PercentAvailability, ComponentID FROM APM_ComponentStatus_Daily WHERE ComponentID = {element.ComponentID} AND ApplicationID = {element.AppID} AND TimeStamp >= :queryi18n.from AND TimeStamp <= CASE WHEN :queryi18n.to > GETDATE() THEN GETDATE() ELSE :queryi18n.to END ) AS pa LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ccs.ComponentID AS ComponentID, SUM(ISNULL(prce.PercentCPU, 0)) AS PercentCPU, SUM(ISNULL(prce.PercentMemory, 0)) AS PercentMemory, SUM(ISNULL(prce.MemoryUsed, 0)) AS MemoryUsed, SUM(ISNULL(prce.PercentVirtualMemory, 0)) AS PercentVirtualMemory, SUM(ISNULL(prce.VirtualMemoryUsed, 0)) AS VirtualMemoryUsed FROM dbo.APM_CurrentComponentStatus AS ccs, dbo.APM_ProcessEvidence_Detail AS prce WHERE ccs.ComponentStatusID = prce.ComponentStatusID GROUP BY ComponentID ) AS stats ON pa.ComponentID = stats.ComponentID )

param.name: Performance.Query
param.value: SELECT DateTime, {query.expression} FROM CPULoad WHERE NodeID = {element.NodeID} AND DateTime >= :queryi18n.from AND DateTime <= :queryi18n.to

param.name: Performance.Query
param.value: SELECT DateTime, {query.expression} FROM VolumeUsage WHERE NodeID = {element.NodeID} AND VolumeID = {element.VolumeID} AND DateTime >= :queryi18n.from AND DateTime <= :queryi18n.to

param.name: Performance.Query
param.value: SELECT DateTime, {query.expression} FROM ResponseTime WHERE NodeID = {element.NodeID} AND DateTime >= :queryi18n.from AND DateTime <= :queryi18n.to

param.name: Performance.Query
param.value: SELECT DateTime, {query.expression} FROM InterfaceTraffic WHERE NodeID = {element.NodeID} AND InterfaceID = {element.InterfaceID} AND DateTime >= :queryi18n.from AND DateTime <= :queryi18n.to

param.name: Performance.Query
param.value: SELECT DateTime, {query.expression} FROM InterfaceErrors WHERE NodeID = {element.NodeID} AND InterfaceID = {element.InterfaceID} AND DateTime >= :queryi18n.from AND DateTime <= :queryi18n.to
